channel.title: RSC Revamped *New Runescape Classic Private Server*
channel.description:
RSC Revamped Runescape Classic Private Server
RSC Revamped Website - [URL=http://rsrevamped.forumbuild.com]rsrevamped.forumbuild.com[/URL] Register - [URL=http://rsrevamped.forumbuild.com]rsrevamped.forumbuild.com[/URL] Download Client - [URL=http://rsrevamped.forumbuild.com]rsrevamped.forumbuild.com[/URL] Forums - [URL=http://rsrevamped.forumbuild.com]rsrevamped.forumbuild.com[/URL]
RSC Revamped is a dedicated Runescape Classic private server that's main goal is to bring RSC back to life. We are brand new and are currently looking for staff members, however we grant players with option for position. (dont ask) We are EXTREMELY dedicated, expect to see numerous updates almost every day!
We have a loads of content such as: Flawless Combat formulae 100% working clan chat system All skills work 100% and use EXACT same formula as real RSC Gamble system (with over 50 prizes) Adventurer for teleports Magic pool for pk teleports Working christmas crackers Working disk of returning Nearly all objects work throughout the WHOLE server Max stat 120! Medium exp rate (150x) (max stat is 120). (Anything higher will drift away from the true feeling of RSC) K/D Ratio Great Pking system All spells work 100% You need to complete Mage Arena miniquest before you can use Godmage Spree System PvP minigame, 50k to enter per person - winner gets all (Tramp, southeast Varrock) Cannons, Poison system, Coal trucks, and the Runecrafting skill coming soon! ALL Dupes fixed Server is Running on a DEDI that wont need to be repaid for until 2013 24/7 online time (it is a very rare occasion for the server to be offline) New sleepingbag method (match the correct name to the color) Expect to see numerous custom content (landscape, items, and NPCs) Always open to suggestions on forums. If they are good I will add them ingame 7 Fully working Quests with great benefits such as a double exp range, ability to wear certain armour, etc.
There is so much more that I cannot even list. Here are some pictures:
Magicpools for easy travel throughout the wilderness. You have to stand still for 5 seconds and must be out of combat for 10 seconds to use it. [IMG]http://i1077.photobucket.com/albums/w462/snemosdn/ScreenShot2012-06-12at75446PM.png[/img]
All new Clan Chat system. Great for pking clans and whatnot. [IMG]http://i1077.photobucket.com/albums/w462/snemosdn/ScreenShot2012-06-12at75526PM.png[/img]
The Adventurer, for easy teleporting [IMG]http://i1077.photobucket.com/albums/w462/snemosdn/ScreenShot2012-06-12at75748PM.png[/img]
Sneakpeak at the Cook's range. You cannot use it until you complete the quest, however it will grant Double Exp. [IMG]http://i1077.photobucket.com/albums/w462/snemosdn/ScreenShot2012-06-12at75946PM.png[/img]
Lever system, here are 6 levers (named A-F) that teleport to Legends Guild, Makeover mage, and training spots that you will find useful [IMG]http://i1077.photobucket.com/albums/w462/snemosdn/ScreenShot2012-06-12at80029PM.png[/img]
Shortcut levers scattered through the world. This is an example of a shortcut from the start of edgeville dungeon, to the skeletons right before the underground wilderness. [IMG]http://i1077.photobucket.com/albums/w462/snemosdn/ScreenShot2012-06-12at80404PM.png[/img]
New players will start off in lumbridge with merely an iron 2h and a sleepingbag! Its up to you to get the rest [IMG]http://i1077.photobucket.com/albums/w462/snemosdn/ScreenShot2012-06-12at80616PM.png[/img]
Loads of custom shops throughout the game. Here is the PK shop and archery shop for example. [IMG]http://i1077.photobucket.com/albums/w462/snemosdn/ScreenShot2012-06-12at80721PM.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1077.photobucket.com/albums/w462/snemosdn/ScreenShot2012-06-12at80823PM.png[/img]
Sneak Peak at one of the quests in game. [IMG]http://i1077.photobucket.com/albums/w462/snemosdn/ScreenShot2012-06-12at80923PM.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1077.photobucket.com/albums/w462/snemosdn/ScreenShot2012-06-12at81333PM.png[/img]
Casting Godmage without completing the miniquest (100 casts of each spell that you wish to learn are needed) [IMG]http://i1077.photobucket.com/albums/w462/snemosdn/ScreenShot2012-06-12at81634PM.png[/img]
The Mage Arena Miniquest [IMG]http://i1077.photobucket.com/albums/w462/snemosdn/ScreenShot2012-06-12at81953PM.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1077.photobucket.com/albums/w462/snemosdn/ScreenShot2012-06-12at82046PM.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1077.photobucket.com/albums/w462/snemosdn/ScreenShot2012-06-12at82158PM.png[/img]
Gambler. You can bet 100k, 500k, or 1m. The more you bet the better the prizes. [IMG]http://i1077.photobucket.com/albums/w462/snemosdn/gamblerr.png[/img]
Come check us out!
Apache ant is no longer needed to run.:)
